title: How to Make Orange Julius

steps.headline: Add all ingredients, except ice cubes, into blender.
steps.description: Blend for one minute, or until smooth.

steps.headline: Add ice cubes one by one, until ice cubes are completely dissolved and drink is frothy.
Add all ingredients, except ice cubes, into blender.
steps.description: Blend for one minute, or until smooth.

steps.headline: Add ice cubes one by one, until ice cubes are completely dissolved and drink is frothy.

text: Orange Julius with Milk Add all ingredients, except ice cubes, into blender. Blend for one minute, or until smooth. Add ice cubes one by one, until ice cubes are completely dissolved and drink is frothy.  Enjoy!  Orange Julius with Ice Cream Add all ingredients, except ice cubes, into blender. Blend for one minute, or until smooth. Add ice cubes one by one, until ice cubes are completely dissolved and drink is frothy.  Enjoy!
